concept.title: Installing the DITA Tookit full package distribution

prolog.author: Richard Johnson
Anna van Raaphorst
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

keywords.indexterm: DITA Open Toolkit distributions full package distribution

conbody.p:
To install the full package distribution:
Download the full package from .
Unzip the package into the C:\ditaot directory on Windows, or into a home directory on Linux.
On Windows, create a new shortcut for C:\ditaot\startcmd.bat to be used to run DITA builds. On Linux execute the shell script startcmd.sh before running a DITA build.
conbody.note: You cannot run a DITA Toolkit build until you have installed the Java SDK.
You may want to install other optional tools to complete your build environment.
